name: try reset app state option

testSteps.description: Given Andrea as a client wishes to reset the state of the application

children.description: Andrea clicks on Añadir producto al carrito
Andrea clicks on obtener datos carrito

testSteps.description: When she chooses the option in the menu

children.description: Andrea clicks on Boton para abrir el menu
Andrea clicks on seleccionar la opcion resetear

testSteps.description: Then she watches the reset app

children.description: Then add product question should be '0'
